---
title: "protocol_22"
---

Protocol_22.m  - follow up protocol 2 after protocol 19 double effector test screen.
Based on protocol 19
Includes:
- greyscale interval frame.
- 4 pixel OFF bar fixation - 180 deg apart
- Reverse Phi - 4 bit - 1 pix step - 8 pixel width bar - 24 px gap.
- Reverse Phi - 4 bit - 4 pix step
- Reverse Phi - 4 bit - 8 pix step

## Protocol Parameters

| Parameter | Value |
|:----------|:------|
| Conditions | 8 |
| Patterns Used | 8 |
| t_acclim | 20s |
| t_pause | 0.015 |


## Conditions

| # | Pattern | Speed | Duration | Description |
|--:|:--------|------:|---------:|:------------|
| 1 | [Pattern 37](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_37.qmd) | 29 | -s | 1 = bar fixation - OFF bar |
| 2 | [Pattern 38](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_38.qmd) | 29 | -s | 1 = bar fixation - ON bar |
| 3 | [Pattern 31](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_31.qmd) | 29 | -s | reverse phi - 1px step |
| 4 | [Pattern 32](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_32.qmd) | 29 | -s | 4 px step |
| 5 | [Pattern 33](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_33.qmd) | 29 | -s | 8 px step |
| 6 | [Pattern 34](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_34.qmd) | 29 | -s | FoE - 30deg |
| 7 | [Pattern 35](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_35.qmd) | 29 | -s | 15 deg |
| 8 | [Pattern 36](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_36.qmd) | 29 | -s | 60 deg |
